info.title: Pantry Pirate Radio
info.description: Read-only food security data API using HSDS specification

get.description:
List organizations with optional filtering and pagination.

Returns paginated list of organizations with optional service details.

Get a specific organization by ID.

Returns detailed information about an organization with optional service details.

Search organizations by name or description.

Returns paginated search results based on the query string.

List locations with optional filtering and pagination.

Returns paginated list of locations with optional service details.

Search locations by geographic area.

Supports both radius-based search (latitude, longitude, radius_miles) and
bounding box search (min/max latitude/longitude).

Get a specific location by ID.

Returns detailed information about a location with optional service details.

List services with optional filtering and pagination.

Returns paginated list of services with optional location details.

Search services by name or description.

Returns paginated search results based on the query string.

Get a specific service by ID.

Returns detailed information about a service with optional location details.

Get only active services.

Returns paginated list of active services with optional location details.

List service-at-location relationships with optional filtering and pagination.

Returns paginated list of service-at-location relationships with optional details.

Get a specific service-at-location relationship by ID.

Returns detailed information about a service-at-location relationship.

Get all locations for a specific service.

Returns paginated list of locations where the service is offered.

Get all services at a specific location.

Returns paginated list of services offered at the location.

List taxonomies (not yet implemented).

This endpoint is part of HSDS v3.1.1 specification but taxonomy
models are not yet implemented in this system.

schema.title: Response List Taxonomies Api V1 Taxonomies  Get

get.description:
Get a specific taxonomy by ID (not yet implemented).

This endpoint is part of HSDS v3.1.1 specification but taxonomy
models are not yet implemented in this system.

schema.title: Response Get Taxonomy Api V1 Taxonomies  Taxonomy Id  Get

get.description:
List taxonomy terms (not yet implemented).

This endpoint is part of HSDS v3.1.1 specification but taxonomy term
models are not yet implemented in this system.

schema.title: Response List Taxonomy Terms Api V1 Taxonomy Terms  Get

get.description:
Get a specific taxonomy term by ID (not yet implemented).

This endpoint is part of HSDS v3.1.1 specification but taxonomy term
models are not yet implemented in this system.

schema.title: Response Get Taxonomy Term Api V1 Taxonomy Terms  Taxonomy Term Id  Get

get.description:
Get locations for map display with optional filtering and aggregation.

This endpoint returns aggregated location data suitable for map visualization.
Locations within the clustering radius are grouped together with source tracking.

Use bounding box parameters to fetch only visible locations for better performance.

Get detailed information for a specific location.

Returns full details including all source data for a single location.

Get metadata about the map data.

Returns statistics and coverage information for all map data.

Get coverage information for all states.

Returns a list of states with location counts and bounding boxes.

Get API metadata including HSDS version and profile information.

Returns information about this API and its relationship with HSDS.

schema.title: Response Get Api Metadata Api V1  Get
